com.ubudu.sdk

Class UbuduSDK

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ubudu.sdk.UbuduSDK

  • public class UbuduSDK
extends java.lang.Object
    UbuduSDK is entry point to the Ubudu SDK. It provides access to the specific managers, unless a manager is not installed or not supported on the device (then null is returned).

      • getVersion

      • getSharedInstance

        public static UbuduSDK getSharedInstance(android.content.Context clientContext)
        Parameters:
        clientContext - application context
        Returns:
        An implementationInstance of the UbuduSDK

      • getSharedInstance

        public static UbuduSDK getSharedInstance(android.content.Context clientContext,
                                         java.lang.String baseURL)
        Application get access to the UbuduSDK thru this static method. The first time it is called, the service is bound to the clientContext. When the application is done with the SDK (eg. in onDestroy), it should send the release() message to unbind the service. baseURL - url to use to access the API. This feature is restricted to servers explicitly allowed by Ubudu. Contact us for more information.
        Parameters:
        clientContext - application context
        baseURL - url to use to access the API
        Returns:
        an implementationInstance of the UbuduSDK

      • setWifiBleFixDisabled

        public void setWifiBleFixDisabled(boolean disabled)
        Disables fix for Wifi and BLE issues while running simultaneously By default it is set to false (fix is enabled).
        Parameters:

        Parameters:

      • setRestartDelay

        public void setRestartDelay(int millis)

        Parameters:
        millis - time in milliseconds

      • setEventLogPeriod

        public void setEventLogPeriod(java.lang.Integer period)
        Set how often event logs should be uploaded to the server. Default is 20 min.
        Parameters:
        period - value in minutes

      • userInformation

        public UbuduUser userInformation()
        Sets the user information. It is recorded in the preferences, and sent to the server when registering. Note: the user implementationInstance is not (necessarily) kept by the SDK, userInformation will return a new object.
        Returns:
        UbuduUser object.

      • setUserInformation

        public void setUserInformation(UbuduUser user)
        Parameters:
        user - UbuduUser object

      • displayWebPage

        public void displayWebPage(java.net.URL webPageURL)
        displayWebPage: will start an activity to fetch the web page display it. When a manager of the UbuduSDK has automaticUserNotificationSendingIsEnabled set to true, and the application is active, then the manager calls this method directly instead of sending user notifications.
        Parameters:
        webPageURL - web page URL

      • displayWebPage

        public void displayWebPage(java.lang.String webPageURL)
        displayWebPage: will start an activity to fetch the web page display it. When a manager of the UbuduSDK has automaticUserNotificationSendingIsEnabled set to true, and the application is active, then the manager calls this method directly instead of sending user notifications.
        Parameters:
        webPageURL - web page URL

      • openSamsungWallet

        public void openSamsungWallet(java.net.URL samsungWalletURL)
        openSamsungWallet: will forward the samsungWalletURL to the Samsung. When a manager of the UbuduSDK has automaticUserNotificationSendingIsEnabled set to true, and the application is active, then the manager calls this method directly instead of sending user notifications. Wallet application (if available).
        Parameters:
        samsungWalletURL - samsung wallet URL

      • openSamsungWallet

        public void openSamsungWallet(java.lang.String samsungWalletURL)
        openSamsungWallet: will forward the samsungWalletURL to the Samsung Wallet application (if available). When a manager of the UbuduSDK has automaticUserNotificationSendingIsEnabled set to true, and the application is active, then the manager calls this method directly instead of sending user notifications.
        Parameters:
        samsungWalletURL - samsung wallet URL

      • openDeepLink

        public void openDeepLink(java.net.URL deepLinkURL)
        openDeepLink: will forward the deepLinkURL the delegate. When a manager of the UbuduSDK has automaticUserNotificationSendingIsEnabled set to true, and the application is active, then the manager calls this method directly instead of sending user notifications.
        Parameters:
        deepLinkURL - deep link URL
